definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.chinese: 从照明原理阐述大窑湾集装箱堆场高杆灯照明节能。

sentences.english: Explosion hazardous area 2 usually adopts safety-increased explosion-proof fluorescent lamp.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸危险2区内一般使用增安型防爆荧光灯照明。

sentences.english: Street-lamp lighting system is an essential part of public facility for city construction.
sentences.chinese: 路灯照明系统是城市建设不可缺少的公用设施。

sentences.english: In turn, the cheaper lighting has led to higher overall energy use.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，更便宜的照明灯导致了使用能源总量的上升。

sentences.english: 3 applies to solar and wind-powered lighting.
sentences.chinese: 应用于太阳能和风能供电照明。

sentences.english: Unique see-through-window & lighting device for easy monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 独到的视明窗及照明设备，检视功能，事半功倍。

sentences.english: Use ornamental illume is relatively the choice of beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 使用装饰性的照明是较佳的选择。

sentences.english: Right now you're holding a parachute from a German flare in your hands.
sentences.chinese: 现在你手里拿的是一个德国照明弹上的降落伞。

sentences.english: The continuos high book shelf integrates lighting which position can be adjusted to the need.
sentences.chinese: 连续的高书架集成照明灯，灯的位置能够按需调节。

sentences.english: With heating function, and add light to illuminate.
sentences.chinese: 具有加热功能，及可加光照明。

sentences.english: The image was taken using Rheinberg illumination.
sentences.chinese: 图片使用莱茵伯格照明法拍摄。

sentences.english: It's the first city that was illuminated with electricity.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一座用电照明的城市。

sentences.english: Our rooms are lighted with electric lams .
sentences.chinese: 我们的房间是用电照明的。

sentences.english: The performance of the human eye largely depends on the level of illuminance in the visual field.
sentences.chinese: 在视野中人类的眼睛表现大量地仰赖照明度的水平。

definition: electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
